body:
@Chills you asked "how is it netorare if those are his family members?" well, I'm not an expert on the netorare genre but the Main character having his whole family screwed by black men is a very typical fantasy (fetish?) for the cuck/cuckhold genre. if you've even been to any cuck forums (like reddit) you'll often see posts by guys fantasizing/hoping that all the women in their lives end up becoming nothing but sex toys for blackmen. not just wives or girl friends but they get some kind of sexual thrill out of the idea of their own mothers, sisters, daughters and nieces (etcetera) being sexual conquered by black men (with unrealistic penis sizes). sometimes cucks will also hope to be further emasculated or even "feminized" to some degree and be sexual conquered themselves by black men. anyway, thats the fetish/fantasy Artist "terasu mc" is portraying in his works, the "cucked family" fantasy...  meh.

Personally I find any kind of race play or race based sexual fantasy kinda gross.
fuck why niggers,fuck the author,why the story is so evil
